mod.name: The Cursed
mod.description:
A new character who uses curse and magic circle to fight against enemies.  
 
The Cursed adds 75 cards (plus 1 extra card), 11 new character-specific relics, and 1 new potion. 
Also Constructed Theme Deck option is available in its config.

cards.name: Dregs
cards.description: Unplayable.

cards.name: Clean up Workshop
cards.description: Ritual : Gain 3 Block and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Clean up Workshop+
cards.description: Ritual : Gain 4 Block and draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Cursed Wand
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Deal 7 damage.
Add a Dregs card into your hand.

cards.name: Cursed Wand+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Deal 9 damage.
Add a Dregs card into your hand.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Circle of Corruption
cards.description:
Circle.
Whenever you play a Skill card, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Circle of Corruption+
cards.description:
Circle.
Whenever you play a Skill card, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Circle of Flame
cards.description:
Circle.
Whenever you play an Attack card, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Circle of Flame+
cards.description:
Circle.
Whenever you play an Attack card, deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Cursed Amulet
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.

Shuffle a random Curse card into your draw pile.

cards.name: Cursed Amulet+

Draw 1 card.
Shuffle a random Curse card into your draw pile.

cards.description:
Deal 9 damage to ALL enemies.
Add a Dregs card into your hand.

cards.name: Cursed Blade+

Add a Dregs card into your hand.

cards.name: Cursed Mace

Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Add a Dregs card into your hand.

Add a Dregs card into your hand.

cards.name: Cursed Shiv
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Add a Dregs card into your hand.

cards.name: Cursed Shiv+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Add a Dregs card into your hand.

cards.name: Flesh from Bone
cards.description: Ritual : Gain 3 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Flesh from Bone+
cards.description: Ritual : Gain 4 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Obscuration
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Ritual : Gain 6 Block again.

cards.name: Obscuration+

Gain 8 Block.
Ritual : Gain 8 Block again.

cards.name: Rapid Movement
cards.description:

Ritual : Draw 2 cards.

Gain 10 Block.
Ritual : Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Raving Staff
cards.description: Deal 8 damage to a random enemy X times.

cards.name: Raving Staff+
cards.description: Deal 11 damage to a random enemy X times.

cards.name: Smoke Screen
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Ritual : Apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Smoke Screen+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Ritual : Apply 3 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Spiteful Strike
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
If you have any Curse card in your hand, gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Spiteful Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
If you have any Curse card in your hand, gain [E] [E].

cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.

cards.name: Stigma+
cards.description:

Apply 4 Bleed.

cards.name: Stretching
cards.description:
Gain 2 Dexterity.
At the end of this turn, lose 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Stretching+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Dexterity.
At the end of this turn, lose 4 Dexterity.

cards.name: Surprise Attack
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 5 damage.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Surprise Attack+
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 8 damage.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: Tactical Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Next turn, draw 2 additional cards.

cards.name: Torture
cards.description: Apply 5 Bleed.

cards.name: Torture+
cards.description: Apply 5 Bleed.

cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
If the enemy has Bleed, double the damage.

Gain 8 Block.
If you have any Curse card in your hand, gain [E].

If you have any Curse card in your hand, gain [E].

cards.name: Wield
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Draw cards equal to the number of Unplayable cards in your hand.

Deal 10 damage.
Draw cards equal to the number of Unplayable cards in your hand.

cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
If you have any Curse in your hand, deal same damage again.

cards.name: Abyss Shockwave+
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage to ALL enemies.
If you have any Curse in your hand, deal same damage again.

cards.name: Ashes to Ashes
cards.description: Ritual : Draw 4 cards.

cards.name: Ashes to Ashes+
cards.description: Ritual : Draw 5 cards.

cards.name: Blessing in Disguise
cards.description:
Exhaust all Curse cards in your hand.
Gain 8 Block for each card Exhausted.

cards.name: Blessing in Disguise+

Exhaust all Curse cards in your hand.
Gain 10 Block for each card Exhausted.

cards.name: Blood Barrier
cards.description:
Ritual : Gain Block equal to your max HP minus your current HP.
Exhaust.

cards.description:
Ritual : Gain Block equal to your max HP minus your current HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Circle of Amplification
cards.description:
Circle.
Whenever you play a Power card, draw 1 card.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Circle of Amplification+
cards.description:
Circle.
Whenever you play a Power card, gain [E] and draw 1 card.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Circle of Blood
cards.description:
Circle.
Whenever you play an Attack card, heal 2 HP.
Ethereal.

cards.description:
Circle.
Whenever you play an Attack card, heal 4 HP.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Circle of Focus
cards.description:
Circle.
Whenever you play a card that costs 3 or more, gain [E].

cards.name: Circle of Focus+
cards.description:
Circle.
Whenever you play a card that costs 2 or more, gain [E].

cards.name: Circle of Windfury
cards.description:
Circle.
Whenever you play a cost 0 card, draw 1 card.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Circle of Windfury+
cards.description:
Circle.
Whenever you play a cost 0 card, draw 1 card.

cards.description:
Gain 20 Block.
Shuffle 2 random Curse cards into your draw pile.

cards.description:

cards.name: Empower Circles
cards.description: Whenever you draw a Circle card, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

cards.description:

Exhaust.

Reduce the cost of all Strike cards in your hand to 0 this turn.

cards.name: Fury Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage.
Reduce the cost of all Strike cards in your hand to 0 this turn.

Add a random Ritual card into your hand.

cards.name: Grudge+
cards.description:
Add a random Ritual card into your hand.

cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of your turn, add a random Cursed card into your hand.

cards.name: Hellfire Breathing+
cards.description: Whenever you draw a Curse card, deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Hemoplague

cards.description: Whenever a Curse card is drawn or Exhausted, gain 3 Block.

cards.name: Mana Bullet

cards.name: Mana Bullet+

cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
If the enemy has Bleed,
gain [E] and
draw 1 card.

If the enemy has Bleed,
gain [E] and
draw 1 card.

cards.name: Prepare Ritual
cards.description:
Exhaust any number of non-Curse cards, then add that many Dregs cards into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Prepare Ritual+
cards.description: Exhaust any number of non-Curse cards, then add that many Dregs cards into your hand.

cards.name: Released Knowledge
cards.description:
Ritual : Add a random Circle card into your hand.

cards.description:

Ethereal.

Ethereal.

cards.name: Salt upon Wound
cards.description:
Enemy immediately loses HP by its Bleed 2 times.
Apply 6 Bleed.

cards.name: Salt upon Wound+

Enemy immediately loses HP by its Bleed 2 times.
Apply 9 Bleed.

Gain [E].

Exhaust.

Apply 4 Bleed and 3 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.description:

cards.description:

cards.name: Troublous Minions
cards.description:
Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it into your hand.
Gain 5 Block and add a Dregs card into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Troublous Minions+
cards.description:
Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it into your hand.
Gain 7 Block and add a Dregs card into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Anti-Aging
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Ritual : Raise your max HP by 2.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Anti-Aging+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Ritual : Raise your max HP by 3.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Circle of Abyss
cards.description:
Circle.
Whenever you play a card, gain 2 Block.
If this card is Exhausted, gain [E].

cards.name: Circle of Abyss+
cards.description:
Circle.
Whenever you play a card, gain 3 Block.
If this card is Exhausted,
gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Collect Tribute
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and add a random Curse card into your hand.

cards.name: Collect Tribute+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of your turn, gain [E] and add a random Curse card into your hand.

cards.name: Cursed Relics
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to 2 times the number of Relics you have.
Add a Dregs card into your hand.

cards.name: Cursed Relics+
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to 3 times the number of Relics you have.
Add a Dregs card into your hand.

cards.name: Dark Barrier
cards.description:
Ritual : Gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dark Barrier+
cards.description:
Ritual : Gain 2 Intangible.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Demon Sword
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Exhaust all Curse cards in your hand and gain 1 Strength for each Exhausted card.

cards.name: Demon Sword+
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Exhaust all Curse cards in your hand and gain 1 Strength for each Exhausted card.

cards.name: Demonic Pact
cards.description: Whenever you play a Ritual card, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Demonic Pact+
cards.description: Whenever you play a Ritual card, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Forbidden Alchemy
cards.description:
Ritual : Obtain an Entropic Brew potion.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Forbidden Alchemy+
cards.description:
Ritual : Obtain an Entropic Brew potion.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mana Circulation
cards.description:
Whenever a Curse card is Exhausted, gain [E].
Ethereal.

cards.name: Mana Circulation+
cards.description: Whenever a Curse card is Exhausted, gain [E].

cards.name: Neow's Might
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by 1 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Neow's Might+
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by 1 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Neurasthenia
cards.description:
Exhaust all Curse cards in your hand.
Enemy loses Strength by 1 plus the number of Exhausted cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Neurasthenia+
cards.description:
Exhaust all Curse cards in your hand.
Enemy loses Strength by 1 plus the number of Exhausted cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Out for Blood
cards.description: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Bleed.

cards.name: Out for Blood+
cards.description: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply 2 Bleed.

cards.name: Parallel World
cards.description:
Copy all cards in your hand and Shuffle them into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Parallel World+
cards.description:
Copy all cards in your hand and Shuffle them into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shock and Awe
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage 3 times.
Shuffle 2 random Curse cards into your draw pile.

cards.name: Shock and Awe+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage 3 times.
Shuffle 2 random Curse cards into your draw pile.

cards.name: Stunning Strike
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
If the enemy intends to attack, apply 1 Stun.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Stunning Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 28 damage.
If the enemy intends to attack, apply 1 Stun.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ultimate Pain
cards.description: ALL enemies immediately loses HP by its Bleed X times.

cards.name: Ultimate Pain+
cards.description: ALL enemies immediately loses HP by its Bleed X+1 times.

cards.name: Void Form
cards.description:
Shuffle 2 random Curse cards into your draw pile.
Whenever you draw a Curse, gain 2 Strength.

cards.name: Void Form+
cards.description:
Shuffle 2 random Curse cards into your draw pile.
Whenever you draw a Curse, gain 3 Strength.

relics.name: Black Magic 101
relics.description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card if your draw pile has any Curse card.
relics.flavorText: Learn about black magic now!!! {4th Edition}

relics.name: Tack
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 4 Bleed to ALL enemies.

relics.name: Bloody Harpoon
relics.description: Whenever you apply Bleed, apply an additional 1 Bleed.

relics.name: Demonic Mark
relics.description: Every time you activate an effect of Circle 3 times in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: If you've seen this mark somewhere, you're just wrong. (Firmly)

relics.name: Crystal Ball
relics.description: Whenever a Curse card is Exhausted, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: Did you say the color looks like Prismatic Shard? You've gone too far.

relics.name: Magic Candle
relics.description: Every time you activate an effect of Circle 10 times, gain [E].
relics.flavorText: It collects nearby mana during ritual.

relics.name: Soul Vessel
relics.description: At the end of combat, heal HP equal to the number of Exhausted Curse cards in this combat.
relics.flavorText: The feast of souls begins now!

relics.name: Black Magic Advanced
relics.description: Replaces Black Magic 101. At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards if your draw pile has any Curse card.
relics.flavorText: [The effects of curses and magic circles on human's body and side effects]

relics.name: Four-Leaf Clover Charm
relics.description: Every time a card or a relic generates a random Curse card during combat, replace it with Dregs.
relics.flavorText: Good luck and happiness come from gratitude.

relics.name: Ominous Mark
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle 2 random Curse cards into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Take a closer look, the mark looks shaking...

relics.name: Pink Pellets
relics.description: Every time you activate an effect of Circle 5 times in a single turn, remove all of your debuffs.

potions.name: Dregs Potion
potions.description: Add 1 Dregs card into your hand.

keywords.name: Bleed
keywords.description: Bleeding creature loses HP whenever it Attacks. Each turn, Bleed is reduced by 1.

keywords.name: Circle
keywords.description: An Unplayable card that can be activated by using other cards while in hand.

keywords.name: Cursed
keywords.description: Any card with the word "Cursed" in its name. Using it will make Dregs or random Curse cards.

keywords.name: Ritual
keywords.description: When using, choose 1 card to Exhaust. Selecting a Curse card will activate the Ritual's effect.
